Creating multi-language blog farms.

== How-to ==

This example is for the Portuguese language and pt_PT.mo file:

# Get the translation file in your country Wordpress website 
# Put the language file pt_PT.mo in wp-content/languages/
# Edit the wp-config.php file and change from <code>define ('WPLANG', ' ');</code> to <code>define ('WPLANG', 'pt_PT');</code>
# Chose your default language in Site Admin > Options

== Languages Pack Resource ==

Current translations can be found at [http://wpmudev.org/other/ WPMUDEV.ORG|Other].

You can create your own translation by using the [http://svn.automattic.com/wordpress-i18n/pot/mu/ official POT files].
